tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE task_lists (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_deadline DATE,
    assigned_to VARCHAR(50),
    assigned_by VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE task_list (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
              description TEXT,
              due_date DATE,
              status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'open');

CREATE TABLE team_members (member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              member_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
              role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
              email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE task_assignment (assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              task_id INT REFERENCES task_list(task_id),
              member_id INT REFERENCES team_members(member_id),
              assigned_date DATE,
              completion_date DATE,
              status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'in progress');

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name STRING,
    description STRING,
    due_date TIMESTAMP,
    assigned_to STRING
);

CREATE TABLE task_comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    comment STRING,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE task_assignments (
    assignment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id UUID,
    assigned_to_user_id UUID,
    assigned_by_user_id UUID,
    assigned_at TIMESTAMP
);
